overview:
Wassim Karkabi is an Entrepreneur as well as a seasoned Executive Search & Executive Branding Consultant with over 13 years experience in the Executive Talent market, currently a Partner and Regional Practice Leader for the Industrial Practice, covering Europe, the Middle East & Africa region, with Stanton Chase International in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

In addition, Wassim Karkabi is also the founder of Career Amazon www.careeramazon.com, an online career platform and job board servicing candidates, employers and recruiters alike.
